text: wideshadhara matha yapena atham anthawadi kandayam yam yam prakasha nikuth kalath me rate bauddha, hindu, muslim saha kristhiyani yana pradhana aagam athara kisindu gatumak nathi bawath siyaluma aagamika nayakayan sahayogayen katayuthu karana bawath, siyaluma aagam sandaha nomandawa rajya anugrahaya labena bawath unwahanse sandahan kalaha.

ee giyama dostharalath kiwwe mastar eka widiyakata inne na kiyala thamayi.eda mastarta wakugaduwak parithyaga karala thibune hamudurunamak.rohale inna ee hamuduruwo balanna mastar yanawa anith wattuwata.nuwara inna kale mastarta danaganna labuna mahanuwara rohalata awith aatha palathwala wakugadu rogin pathwena apahasutha gana.eeta passe mastar mokada kale ohuta labuna sammanayak samanga pirinamana santhosam mudala parithyaga karala me wakugadu roginta nawathan pahasukam hadala denna idamak aran dunna.mastar koyi mohothakawath hithuwe na ohu rogiyek kiyala.ohoma inna atharathuredi thamayi 2006 di mage kulundul adhyakshana karyayata athagahanna mama sudanam wune.sangithaya gana hithuwama mage mathakayata kelinma aawe kemadasa mastarwa.me paniwidaya mama mulinma mastarta dunne chitha්rapata adhyaksha ke.ee.dabliw.pererage awamangalyayata ohu boralla kanaththata awith innakota.mastar mama emil sola ge pariwarthanayak thamayi karanna hadanne.
rajaye waidya pitawala daruwanta igenuma labanna badha kirimen wanne ema daruwange anagathaya anduru wimayi.
